评论详情: Love this blazer and get many compliments! Great quality, great fit. Exciting to own designer looks for less thanks to the Rent the Runway Pre-loved selections. Very comfy and can be worn multiple ways.
Great quality, so cute and versatile

I love mara hoffman, the quality is always there and the styles are typically classic. This blazer, however, was well worn. I had it cleaned professionally, but it still looked worn out.  too bad, I liked the style
